InputProperty.Description: "The update rate for all aspect object properties subscribed for"

PropertyDescription.Name: Enabled
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlUseLock' > 0 && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(3) && (!$'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) || $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1)) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then True else False

PropertyDescription.Name: Value
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1) then Variant(0) else Variant(1)

PropertyDescription.Name: Enabled
PropertyDescription.Value: $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlUseLock' > 0 && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable

PropertyDescription.Name: Enabled
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlUseLock' > 0 && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(4) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && !$'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then True else False

PropertyDescription.Name: Enabled
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlUseLock' > 0 && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(3) && (!$'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) || $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1)) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then True else False

PropertyDescription.Name: Enabled
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlUseLock' > 0 && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(3) && (!$'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) || $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1)) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then True else False

PropertyDescription.Name: Text
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1) then $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_LOCKEDBYME' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) then $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_LOCKEDBYOTHER' + $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockOwner' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(2) then $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_LOCKEDBYME' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(3) then $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_UNLOCKED' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(4) then $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_WAITING' else $'nt::Process Graphics:NLSID_LOCKEDBYME'

PropertyDescription.Name: Image
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) && $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(1) then $'im::Standard Symbols:LockedByMe' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(0) then $'im::Standard Symbols:LockedByOther' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(2) then $'im::Standard Symbols:LockedByMe' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(3) then $'im::Standard Symbols:LockingEnabled' else if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockStatus'#Bit(4) then $'im::Standard Symbols:LockPending' else $'im::Standard Symbols:LockedByMe'

PropertyDescription.Name: Line
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then Pen(DarkGray, 1.) else Empty

PropertyDescription.Name: FrameWidth
PropertyDescription.Value: if $'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then 2. else 0.

PropertyDescription.Name: Frame3dEffect
PropertyDescription.Value: if !$'pr::AC 800M Lock Control:Global Properties Definition:ControlLockCommand'#IsWritable then Flat else if $'lv::_ButtonState' = Left then Sunken else Raised
